content:
In this dataset, people are asked to rate the sentiment of text. The possible ratings are as follows: Very negative (-2), somewhat negative (-1), neutral (0), somewhat positive (1), very positive (2).

Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: 2 days, 3 old games finished.  Prey, Uncharted: Drakes fortune & Mass Effect, all great games.  Sequals all on the horizon though
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: @THEsaragilbert I just fed, changed and put to sleep our 5=month old twins...now I get to wind down for bed myself
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: Finally, I got round to watching Drew Barrymore starrer Ever After, pretty cute movie, especially the old English kingdom setting
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: Daniel's graduation today!  man, I'm old.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: Why are kids' toys much better now when I'm too old to play with them?
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 6:
Text: @Mr_PaulEvans yea i got two lil ones  ah the life of a young mama i love it lol how bout you? no lil 1s?
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: im sad, i was this show on tlc about a 12 yr old getting 30 yrs in prison for killing his grandparents
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 8:
Text: @Sonos phono out on old vinil players into a pre-amp that has a line out enables older units too
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: Just got home  listening to old Vanessa Hudgens songs hhaa, random ;)
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: @goldymom well lucky u to look younger than u actually r!  what's ur secret ;-): @goldymom well lucky u to loo.. http://tinyurl.com/qasojl
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: Old age can prove to be a curse in lot many cases when with falling memory and declining health one is unable to take care of everyday situations.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 12:
Text: @drbaka http://twitpic.com/2ax1g - Got Mouse?  (Columbian Redtail boa (or very young Peruvian Redtail boa)), right?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: @MagpieSparkles Haha SO WRONG but so yummy  Ah the youngins :p
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 14:
Text: I love looking through old songs.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: @NattyMcElls I am 29 years old..
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: @zamalforemo yeah same old place
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 17:
Text: @GGGKeri yes she is 24..I am 29..the oldest of the bunch.   aww I loves you! x.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: @KimKardashian your onn tv over here!!! I thinks its so old.. Dubai is never up to date  when do you vissit dubai?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: @Karenknowsbest   it's heartbreaking, isn't it?  Was reading about one couple that left behind two young kids.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 20:
Text: @abideedles Oh, that's awful, I'm so sorry to hear that happened to you and your daughter.  How old is she?  What a hard time for you
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 21:
Text: @David_Henrie can you say a prayer for my friend Chealse because she just lost her dad.  so i wont see her at my younglife group so ye ...
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: @GoodGreenTea I am mostly chortling you horrid old pot of tea you
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 23:
Text: "Arsenic and Old Lace" is on tv! One of my favorite old movies - I can't believe it  So perfect for bewitching hour.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: Chillin at jocelyns!! my old stalker is coming
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 25:
Text: @TeeBunny thanks for the box! Do u have a new catalog, I  never got a chance to look at the old one
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: @movies_ie There was a young man named Spock. Who had an enormous... ego.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 27:
Text: @JadeChi aw yea I hope it doesn't ruin ur nite.  GREAT memories made w/ u boo. Def will think bk to em when my kids tlk abt how old I am
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: Going to take flowers to Stephs grandmother who turned 88 years young today.  I hope I am that cute when I am her age
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 29:
Text: @SnarkySabs whatever that 3rd one was-about all the werewolf shite, just got too cheezy 4 me. I'm old school-give me Anne Rice
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 30:
Text: @fxp123 perfect, so its the same ending as mine, understood. and one of my stage names as a younger man was JAK FROSS lol how interesting
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: @uncivilized I just had to explain hyper colour to a 22 year old. I'm old
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer corresponding to the label.
